name: Yoshimi Hanjie
description:
A simple Hanjie (also known as Picross or Nonograms) game for the Playdate handheld console.

To be honest I stopped working on this when I discovered RDK had already made an incredible Nonogram Playdate game, Sketch, Share, Solve! 

I might work on it more at some point, but in the meantime the demo below has several puzzles to play.
